mapper.update:
update itms_project
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_short_name = #{projectShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_desc = #{projectDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

commons = #{commons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update itms_project set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_short_name = #{projectShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_desc = #{projectDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commons = #{commons,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT ip.*,ipd.product_name productName FROM itms_project ip INNER JOIN itms_product ipd ON ip.product_id = ipd.id AND ipd.is_deleted = 'N' WHERE ip.is_deleted = 'N'
AND ( ip.project_name LIKE concat('%', #{projectName}, '%') OR ip.project_short_name LIKE concat('%', #{projectName} , '%') )
AND ipd.id = #{param.productId}
ORDER BY update_time DESC
